entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

<!DOCTYPE html><html><head><meta charset="UTF-8"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width"><title>BV å·è·‹æ‰ˆã€€ï½ Who done it!</title></head><body><p>BVå·è½¬AVå·</p><input type="text" id="av"><button onclick="return av() && false">AV å·è½¬ BV å·</button><input type="text" id="bv"><button onclick="return bv() && false">BV å·è½¬ AV å·</button><p id="result">ç»“æœï¼š</p><p>åˆ«é—®æˆ‘ä¸ºä½•è¿™ä¹ˆä¸‘ï¼Œè¿™ç©æ„å«ç®€æ´é£ï¼ï¼ï¼</p><p>æ”¹å†™è‡ª <a href="https://www.zhihu.com/question/381784377/answer/1099438784">mcfx çš„çº¸ç³Šå›ç­”</a>ï¼Œå¹¶åŠ ä¸Šä¸€äº›é€‚å½“çš„å¤„ç†ã€‚</p><p>å¯ä»¥çš„è¯ï¼Œä¸‹é¢èµæˆ‘æ¯å’–å•¡~~~è°¢è°¢ï¼ï¼ï¼</p><script>// æ”¹å†™è‡ª https://www.zhihu.com/question/381784377/answer/1099438784ï¼Œå¹¶åŠ ä¸Šä¸€äº›é€‚å½“çš„å¤„ç†'use strict';const table = [...'fZodR9XQDSUm21yCkr6zBqiveYah8bt4xsWpHnJE7jL5VG3guMTKNPAwcF'];const s = [11, 10, 3, 8, 4, 6];const xor = 177451812;const add = 8728348608;const av2bv = (av) => {    let num = NaN;    if (Object.prototype.toString.call(av) === '[object Number]') {        num = av;    } else if (Object.prototype.toString.call(av) === '[object String]') {        num = parseInt(av.replace(/[^0-9]/gu, ''));    };    if (isNaN(num) || num <= 0) {        // ç½‘é¡µç‰ˆç›´æ¥è¾“å‡ºè¿™ä¸ªç»“æœäº†        return 'Â¿ä½ åœ¨æƒ³æ¡ƒå­ï¼Ÿ';    };    num = (num ^ xor) + add;    let result = [...'BV1  4 1 7  '];    let i = 0;    while (i < 6) {        // è¿™é‡Œæ”¹å†™å·®ç‚¹çŠ¯äº†è¿ç®—ç¬¦ä¼˜å…ˆçº§çš„å‘        // æœç„¶ Python ä¹Ÿä¸æ˜¯ç‰¹åˆ«ç†Ÿç»ƒ        // è¯´èµ·æ¥ ** æŒ‰ç…§ä¼ ç»Ÿè¯­æ³•åº”è¯¥å†™æˆ Math.pow()ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘ä¸ªäººæ›´å–œæ¬¢ ** ä¸€äº›        result[s[i]] = table[Math.floor(num / 58 ** i) % 58];        i += 1;    };    return result.join('');};const bv2av = (bv) => {    let str = '';    if (bv.length === 12) {        str = bv;    } else if (bv.length === 10) {        str = `BV${bv}`;    // æ ¹æ®å®˜æ–¹ APIï¼ŒBV å·å¼€å¤´çš„ BV1 å…¶å®å¯ä»¥çœç•¥    // ä¸è¿‡å•ç‹¬çœç•¥ä¸ª B åˆä¸è¡Œï¼ˆ    } else if (bv.length === 9) {        str = `BV1${bv}`;    } else {        return 'Â¿ä½ åœ¨æƒ³æ¡ƒå­ï¼Ÿ';    };    if (!str.match(/[Bb][Vv][fZodR9XQDSUm21yCkr6zBqiveYah8bt4xsWpHnJE7jL5VG3guMTKNPAwcF]{10}/gu)) {        return 'Â¿ä½ åœ¨æƒ³æ¡ƒå­ï¼Ÿ';    };    let result = 0;    let i = 0;    while (i < 6) {        result += table.indexOf(str[s[i]]) * 58 ** i;        i += 1;    };    return `av${result - add ^ xor}`;};const av = () => {    let result = av2bv(document.getElementById('av').value);    if (result !== 'Â¿ä½ åœ¨æƒ³æ¡ƒå­ï¼Ÿ') {        document.getElementById('result').innerHTML = `ç»“æœï¼š<a href="https://www.bilibili.com/video/${result}">${result}</a>`;    } else {        document.getElementById('result').innerHTML = `ç»“æœï¼š${result}`;    };};const bv = () => {    let result = bv2av(document.getElementById('bv').value);    if (result !== 'Â¿ä½ åœ¨æƒ³æ¡ƒå­ï¼Ÿ') {        document.getElementById('result').innerHTML = `ç»“æœï¼š<a href="https://www.bilibili.com/video/${result}">${result}</a>`;    } else {        document.getElementById('result').innerHTML = `ç»“æœï¼š${result}`;    };};document.getElementById('av').addEventListener('keydown', (event) => {    if (event.keyCode === 13) {        av();    };});document.getElementById('bv').addEventListener('keydown', (event) => {    if (event.keyCode === 13) {        bv();    };});</script></body></html>

èšŠ

(èŠ‚è‚¢åŠ¨ç‰©é—¨æ˜†è™«çº²åŒç¿…ç›®èšŠç§‘åŠ¨ç‰©)

var gulp = require('gulp');var minifycss = require('gulp-minify-css');var babel = require('gulp-babel');var uglify = require('gulp-uglify');var htmlmin = require('gulp-htmlmin');var htmlclean = require('gulp-htmlclean');gulp.task('minify-css', function () {    return gulp.src('./public/**/*.css')        .pipe(minifycss())        .pipe(gulp.dest('./public'));});gulp.task('minify-html', function () {    return gulp.src('./public/**/*.html')        .pipe(htmlclean())        .pipe(htmlmin({            removeComments: true,            minifyJS: true,            minifyCSS: true,            minifyURLs: true,        }))        .pipe(gulp.dest('./public'))});gulp.task('minify-js', function () {    return gulp.src(['./public/**/*.js', '!./public/**/*.min.js'])        .pipe(babel({ presets: ['es2015'] }))        .pipe(uglify())        .pipe(gulp.dest('./public'));});gulp.task('default', ['minify-html', 'minify-css', 'minify-js']);

entry.title: æ–‡å­—èƒŒæ™¯ç²’å­ç‰¹æ•ˆ
entry.content:
å‰è¨€

ä¸€æ¬¾jQuery+CSS3çš„æ–‡å­—èƒŒæ™¯ç²’å­åŠ¨ç”»ç‰¹æ•ˆï¼Œä¸€å…±6ç§ç²’å­æ•ˆæœï¼Œæ¯ç§æ–‡å­—èƒŒæ™¯çš„ç²’å­æ•ˆæœéƒ½ä¸åŒï¼Œæœ‰æ¼‚æµ®çš„æœ‰å è½çš„ç­‰ç­‰ã€‚

0x001 ç‰¹æ•ˆæ¼”ç¤º

This is fires

0x002 Fires ç‰¹æ•ˆ

1. JS ä»£ç 

<script>function fire() {    $.each($(".particletext.fire"), function(){       var firecount = ($(this).width()/50)*20;       for(var i = 0; i <= firecount; i++) {          var size = $.rnd(8,12);          $(this).append('<span class="particle" style="top:' + $.rnd(40,70) + '%; left:' + $.rnd(-10,100) + '%;width:' + size + 'px; height:' + size + 'px;animation-delay: ' + ($.rnd(0,20)/10) + 's;"></span>');       }    }); }   jQuery.rnd = function(m,n) {      m = parseInt(m);      n = parseInt(n);      return Math.floor( Math.random() * (n - m + 1) ) + m;  }  fire();</script>

2. CSS ä»£ç
